sentence: The room was adequate for a family of 2 2 as it had two queen beds
so much so that having a few drinks in the evening was simply not possible as it would have cost almost as much as the holiday
We have children so are not against this but as a couple having a rare child free holiday this would have been the wrong hotel for us

But as there are that many people wanting to have an experience with the dolphins we thought groups of 10 where fine taking into account the health and wellbeing of the dolphins and the fact they could not work all day constant if there where groups of 2

Recently returned from Atlantis the palm on arivel we were early for check in they did try to get us our rooms before check in time some of our party did get theirs early wich was greatthe room I was first giving was on the forth floor on east wing had a bad smell so I changed rooms to the 2nd floor of the east wing wish was much better no smell had balcony with view of the burj in the distance my family member had room on 18th floor east wing view was very nice no welcome drink on arivel wich would have been nice touch after 7hour flight the reception staff were very busy if you asked for help they would try just was not as good as service as I have had in other 5star hotels
We can not wait to come back to Atlantis on our next trip and will keep it our number one choice
After an hour of a complete waste of time I decided to go back to go back to my hotel room as there was absolutely nothing for me and my family to do
We became apprehensive we went online to book a desert safari trip and seen that although the trip was still available the entertainment part of it would not be provided belly dancers music etc
In summary it is an expensive place to visit and be prepared to spend lots more than you have already paid for he holiday
Quite unpleasant start to our staycation
Management more than made up for it and actually their compensation made our holiday

I have worked in the travel industry for years and I can honestly say after seeing a child drown whilst on a holiday abroad I think the number 1 priority on holiday should be fully trained lifeguards and the safety of guests in the pool and sea
As far as our children were concerned they said it ’s the best holiday they have been too and they absolutely loved the waterpark
I feel let down by Atlantis palm and how they treated me and my family
Anyways since it was around 415 pm and my parents were waiting i took the rooms available
For sure we are never going back they just ruined our trip and wasted our money It was really a great hotel back in the day
Spending quality time for the whole family at The Palm
It caters for all ages but is brilliant for families
If you want nice pools and family friendly facilities go for it
Stayed 3 nights half board as part of an Emirates holidays package
All in all a wonderful holiday and we can not wait to go back
This was our first trip to Dubai it is somewhere I wanted to visit for a long time
Most amazing trip with my family Christmas 2019
